etymology.interpretation: Combines 耳 “ear,” signaling a meaning related to hearing, with 殸 as the sound component guiding pronunciation. The graphic thus links the idea of hearing with a phonetic cue from the 殸 series, yielding the sense of sound/voice.
etymology.simplification: In simplification, the semantic ear 耳 was dropped and the graph was streamlined by adopting a reduced form of the phonetic component, yielding 声 with fewer strokes.

examples.chinese: 我听见奇怪的声响(我聽見奇怪的聲響)。
她的声音很温柔(她的聲音很溫柔)。
请小声一点(請小聲一點)。
